title: Shareholder Management System
description: A comprehensive platform for managing shareholders, securities, and real-time voting. Includes user modules, assembly management, customizable reports, and an advanced financial system.
technologies: Spring Boot Backend / JPA / Spring Security JWT
contributions: Developed a dynamic UI using Angular 16, Angular Material, and Tailwind CSS.
Built admin modules for securities and custom reports.
Secure authentication via JWT and Spring Security.
Wrote unit and integration tests using Jasmine and Karma.
Implemented a scalable backend with Spring Boot and PostgreSQL.
